蕂字的基本解释

蕂
shèng
〔苣（
j?）蕂〕芝麻。

蕂字的汉语字典释义

[①]［shèng］
［《廣韻》詩證切，去證，書。］
植物名。即胡麻。又名巨胜、油麻、脂麻、芝麻。一年生草本。种子有黑白二种，皆可榨油。

蕂字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　蕂； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页1056第31
【唐韻】詩證切，音勝。【玉篇】苣蕂，胡麻也。　亦作䕝。

蕂字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
蕂字的起名意思

暂无。

Lint
Basic explanation of words
Lint
shèng
〔Leaves (
j?) 蕂] sesame.
Lint
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［shèng］
["Guangyun" poem proof cut, go proof, book. ]
Botanical name. That is flax. Also known as Jusheng, You Hemp, Fatty Hemp, and Sesame. Annual herb. There are two kinds of seeds, black and white, both of which can be used for oil extraction.
Lint
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Chinese Characters] 　蕂; Kangxi Strokes: 18; Page Number: Page 1056 31
[Tang Yun] Poetry proof is cut, sound wins. [Jade articles] Fructus botryoides, flax also.　 also as 䕝.
